TopicTitle: Gear brakes stop working without pilot

Articles.Content:
Built a plane (with MK1 cockpit) to make some "perform visual survey" missions, some which involve making an EVA report landed.

Everything went fine, until i left the plane to make the EVA. A message appears then that SAS has being deactivated because of pilot missing, but it seems this leads to the gear brakes not working anymore too. Long story short, all i could do then was watching my plane starting to slide away pretty fast :/ Not really logical that i can't leave a plane parked with brakes on its own

And a question a bit out of topic: Is there any way to make the spots for those contracts visible while flying ? Incredible hard landing at the right spot if you can only see it in map view.
